QuestData.Title: The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
QuestData.Description: They had to ship the champion in from the Blade's Edge gladiator pits. He was training on mountain giants - three at a time.$B$BIf you win this one, you become the new champion. What do you think your odds are, kid? Do you have a shot? Just give me the word and I'll bet the house on you.$B$BNow get in there and win!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Warmaul Champion. Should you win, speak with Wodin the Troll-Servant to collect your reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Laughing Skull Ruins in Nagrand.
QuestData.CompletionText: The fight's over when you or your opponent are dead on the floor.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh boy. Mogor has invoked his right of battle as hero of the Warmaul. You have to fight him!$B$BNobody ever said the Warmaul were good sports... erm... ogres.
